# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

Use this section to tell people about which versions of your project are
currently being supported with security updates.

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.2.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| 1.1.x   | :x:                |
| < 1.1   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

We take the security of Green Bot seriously. If you discover a security vulnerability, please follow these steps to report it:

1.  **Do not create a public issue.** Security vulnerabilities should be handled discreetly to protect users.
2.  Please report the vulnerability by [Creating a Security Advisory](https://github.com/akshayejh/green-bot/security/advisories/new) or contacting the maintainers directly.
3.  Include as much information as possible, such as:
    *   The version(s) of Green Bot affected.
    *   Steps to reproduce the vulnerability.
    *   Potential impact of the vulnerability.
    *   Any suggested mitigations or fixes.

We will acknowledge your report and work to investigate and address the issue as quickly as possible.
